Submission

Use the Submission dialog box to submit a build job. After you fill out the fields, click Submit to submit the build job and save it. If you wish to save the build job without submitting it, click Save.

Field Descriptions

Serena ChangeMan Builder project A read-only field displaying the name of the Serena ChangeMan Builder project.
Search path A read-only field displaying the name of the search path.
Job name A read-only field displaying the name of the build job.
Job availability: Private Click to make the build job private--that is, executable only by you.
Job availability: Public Click to make the build job public--that is, executable by anyone.
Build machine Choose the build machine on which the build is to run. The build machine displayed by default is the one selected in the Job Selection Dialog Box. Changing the build machine also changes the displayed build commands, because each build machine has its own set of saved build commands.
Build commands text area Accept the displayed build commands, or edit them. This is the last chance to edit the build commands before Serena ChangeMan Builder executes the build job.

See Also

Build Parameters Dialog Box
